verbs.description: [ARG0: U.S. President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un] [V: signed] [ARG1: a “ comprehensive ” document] [ARGM-TMP: after a working lunch meeting during their historic summit in Singapore] , Trump said Tuesday .

U.S. President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un signed a “ comprehensive ” document after a [V: working] [ARG0: lunch] meeting during their historic summit in Singapore , Trump said Tuesday .

[ARG1: U.S. President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un signed a “ comprehensive ” document after a working lunch meeting during their historic summit in Singapore] , [ARG0: Trump] [V: said] [ARGM-TMP: Tuesday] .
